code: import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{getOneRestaurant}from'../../store/restaurants';import{deleteReview}from'../../store/reviews';import'./DeleteReview.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function DeleteReview(_ref){let{setShowDeleteModal,review}=_ref;const dispatch=useDispatch();const deleteReviewHandler=async e=>{e.preventDefault();await dispatch(deleteReview(review.id));await dispatch(getOneRestaurant(review.restaurant_id));setShowDeleteModal({showModal:false,reviewId:0});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"delete-review-modal-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"delete-review-heading",children:"ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO DELETE YOUR REVIEW?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"delete-review-buttons-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setShowDeleteModal(false),className:"delete-review-nevermind-button",children:"Nevermind"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:deleteReviewHandler,className:"delete-review-delete-button",children:"Delete"})]})})]});}export default DeleteReview;
